narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Celisa Martinez is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Zapata, TX. From 2024-08 through 2024-12, this provider received $79K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 193 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 92% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
